title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, February 13, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of religious historian Elaine Pagels, author of The Gnostic Gospel,  and most recently, Why Religion? A Personal Story.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of religious historian Elaine Pagels, author of The Gnostic Gospel,  and most recently, Why Religion? A Personal Story.
